description:
• You will learn to solve the 3x3 rubik cube in about 45 min time
  • Once you learn, you will be able to solve the cube in about 5 min time
  • The course is divided into very small videos (~ 2 min) for easy and better understanding
  • Instruction is based on the real Rubik cube
  • No need for any prerequisite
  • No need to remember any complex alorithm
  • Depends on the response to this course, I will develop 2x2 Rubik solving using the same algorithm
title: Solve 3x3 & 2x2 Rubik cube with just one simple algorithm
